website_summaries.verdict: The budget- and beginner-friendly camera flash to choose when you need advanced features for a small price.
pros: Near universal compatibility means this camera flash can be used with most DSLR and mirrorless cameras
Includes wireless shooting modes for off camera photography and studio shots
cons: Flash takes longer to recharge than other more expensive flash options available

customer_reviews.title: Solid manual flash
customer_reviews.text: My other cheap manual flash died a couple months ago, so I needed another. Came across this one and decided to give it a go because of the reviews. After a month of use, this flash does not dissapoint, especially for the price. Very powerful. The batteries last quite awhile and the recharge is pretty fast enough for my needs. I primarily use this flash for Macro work with a LumiQuest soft box. The combo works great. It is a big flash, so be aware before purchasing. Doesn't bother me, but might for others. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not so good at first..but then!
customer_reviews.text: So I had a few problems with this flash at first. It seemed to only be firing once and then stopping, then Id have to power them both off and keep going. Then I realized that I could not use live view while using the flash, after that I was very pleased. I bought a $5 softbox from amazon as well and it was a great duo. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Salter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice photo flash
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a flash for my Canon Rebel EOS DSLR camera which would be more adaptable than the original one which sometimes gave me trouble. This flash can be aimed 3 ways and it can be adjusted for automatic and for manual camera settings. It does a great job and works perfectly with my camera. It was a good price as well. I only received it last week and have just tested it out in my house, but I am sure it will be an indispensable part of my camera gear.
customer_reviews.author: Foxcat

customer_reviews.title: Neewer TT-560 or Amazon Basics Clone
customer_reviews.text: Exact copy of my Neewer TT560 or Amazon Basics. Most probably same product and just relabeled. Otherwise, same great features and performance. Only lasted around 3 years but at that price, easier to just get a new one. And yes, it does have have a input for three prong Canon type external cluster battery pack. Incredible buy. 8/2/20: Just died today. Could not even do a test flash. At least my older Neewer TT560 lasted 3 years. Sadly, this one lasted only three months. Time to go back to major brands or higher priced Neewer products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Easy No extra adjustments needed
customer_reviews.text: I received this one day early and was well package. I had another one that I had to return, was not compatible with my camera even though the company assured me it was. I spent 2 hours with the previous one, adjusting settings etc. but it never worked. I have a Canon EOS XS and this worked perfectly right out of the box. Popped in the batteries, attached to my camera and I was good to shoot. Easy to adjust, turn on and off and has a powerful top end light. Very happy with this purchase and the price can not be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Recharges very quick
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to durability, this is a budget flash that is easy to use with simple controls. The flash has M, S1, S2 settings, a power on light, and adjustable flash power with 8 settings and of course it can tilt. Plus a slide out diffuser lens. Works with my Lumix FZ80. I wanted simple and low cost making this a great value and was surprised how quickly it recharged between cycles. I cannot justify spending a hundred or more at this time on a flash unit until I get better acquainted with my camera system. Think any beginner or budget minded person is getting a bargain with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Reg5559

customer_reviews.title: perfect for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Easy use for a beginner, I did not experience any issues. Battery lasted plenty time I didn't need to replace during an hour photo shoot of consistent photographing. I also think its perfect for really any occasion to get the perfect lighting youre looking for
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these flashes, and within a few months the led’s starting randomly flashing and one, then the other completely stopped functioning. I just shoot casually and they were stored inside so they weren’t used heavily or abused. Unless you are looking to use them for a single event, I’d advise trying something else
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This flash is awesome! Let me start by saying I still use an CANON EOS TS camera. This was very popular back in 2015/2016. It still does fantastic work. I needed another flash to replace a $300 one I had from 2013. I needed it quick. The settings are very basic and the flash has a good range of light volume. I purchased it with a$10 filter set i got as well. The value for the price is awesome. It takes 4 Double A batteries and lasted for 6 hours while I was shootin a proposal. It probably would hav e last longer had I needed it. I also took about 300+ pictures as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great starter flash for your DSLR:)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I used this for a friend's wedding and it went well! I stuck pretty much to the manual settings with regards to the flash because I preferred to. The other settings worked just as fine. This light works great with my Nikon D3200 and have nothing to complain about! I highly recommend it as a starter flash for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anne DiResta

customer_reviews.title: this flash has been fantastic and has made a huge difference in my photos
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this flash has been fantastic and has made a huge difference in my photos. I have noticed that the camera (Nikon D40) will not capture a photo as the flash battery gets low. I'm not sure what indicates low battery, but I think it is a flashing green and red light. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for a general use external flash.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my Cannon EOS R caera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flash to use with my cannon EOS R. I've used it several times now and I'm happy with the performance of this flash. I like that the flash tilts up and allows for a softer flash in my photos instead of harsh/bright lighting. This is a good flash for the price and I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be easy to use. Simple, adjustable flash levels. I am an amateur that just wanted to take better photos of scenery, family and dogs. I use it with my new Olympus pen E PL8 camera. Flash seems to be a great value for the money. The price for what you get is outstanding. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D. Seth, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it thus far
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy it is to use on my Nikon D5100. I'm very impressed by it so far but I've only had it a week or so. Wanting to see how long the batteries are good for before I need to change it. Will update review with that information down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Super Duper Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This speed flash is very easy to use. It's literally plug and play (of course you have to turn it on). 4 AA batteries (not included) will get it ready to go and it's awesome! I can use with it with Nikon DSLR and my Samsung Mirrorless. It's a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: I got this flash to up my photography game. Works OK, my initial unit burned out but the seller replaced very quickly and so far so good. Update: I bought a 2nd flash and one of the 2 (I'm not sure which one) died. I would not recommend firing it repeatedly at full power for 3 minutes straight, get yourself a real strobe if you want to do that.
customer_reviews.author: PeteTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Canon Rebel t7
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I have a Canon Rebel t7, which it states it works with, nope. I’ve spent three hours watching videos and it won’t work. The flash will turn on and it will do the test but when I get to the flash settings>flash firing is enabled but then I go to check any of the other options on the flash settings menu, and I get “menu not available. Flash is off or unsupported, or an accessory is attached.” I’ve watched all the videos I can and will be returning to just buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Stormie

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I don’t know the difference between this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I don’t know the difference between this and a pricier one. I do love the results just from a few pictures that I have taken. I have taken shots with my cameras flash than with this speed flash. The results are phenomal! You can check it out for yourself at the bottom the first one is with the speed light and the second is with my cameras flash, the settings were the same for each picture.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Great flash! and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am a rookie photographer and this flash is the perfect piece to finish my camera adventure. Easy to mount thought it would be heavier but no it balance it out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jaime garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible With Canon Rebel T7!
customer_reviews.text: The flash was a great deal, but didn’t work on my Canon Rebel T7! I tried everything to get it working, even talking to Amazon Customer support (which was a joke! Absolutely no help). I might just have a dud, but I’m going to return this and buy a more dependable option!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: it works great!
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty big. wasn't quite expecting that. its sorta cheap material, but for the price, it can't be beat. it has all sorts of angles to adjust to it has quite a few flash brightness levels, and it has a white reflector, which i find myself using most. uses four AA battaries.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works good - Sony a6000 & Canon
customer_reviews.text: I must said the seller has very good and supportive customer service. I receive another one since the first did not turn on. The flash itself is powerful for a beginner like me... works perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have too high of hopes for this because of the price point, but I’m pleasantly surprised. While it’s taken a backseat to my video light at weddings, it’s still a wonderful flash.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad!
customer_reviews.text: A decent flash. This flash lacks a modern control panel but it won't stop me from taking some nice pictures with it. Unfortunately it's a little dated. It's lack of modern controls made it feel clunky to operate and the fact that it does not have a rechargable battery, instead using 6 double A's, is a troublesome matter.
customer_reviews.author: Titus

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH SAMSUNG NX30
customer_reviews.text: Nice sensitivity with the wireless flash and Super bright! works well with my Samsung NX30 Mirrorless Camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Macaoay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Comparable to the Nikon Speedlight!
customer_reviews.text: I had been borrowing my brother's Nikon Speed light (valued at $500) but seeing as I am new to photography I wanted to try a less expensive version before investing the money. This product does not disappoint! In fact, it has a pull out diffuser like the Nikon Speed light PLUS a pull out white card that can be used to bounce the light and really makes for a nice picture. I am so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mandi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Said it would work with my camera didn’t and is missing part of the stand I never used it fully and it was a waste
customer_reviews.author: Cassidie lace

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The plastic for this flash makes it very lightweight which in turn makes it seem very cheap but outside of that this flash is excellent. For the money, this is so worth it. At the end of the day it does it's job in great fashion despite the materials. I hope it lasts and I don't experience any malfunctions in the near or distant future.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Meneses

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Easy enough to use and works well in a small setting - definitely recommend for fellow beginner photographers.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: It worked as advertised when new; used once then failed after being stored
customer_reviews.text: I rarely shoot with flash, but this is a great add-on when needed. The unit seems well-built and the included stand is a nice plus. Update: Mine hasn't been used for sometime and now the lights on the back just blink when you turn it on. It won't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stagea

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these a main flash and a slave, we were very impressed with the ease of use and they also worked with with the prior brand of speed light purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Full Manual, but gets the job done ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, Full Manual, but gets the job done. For the price and function of this flash it is worth it. I purchased this version because it works with my Samsung NX 300. There is no TTL or automatic metering, so you have to know how to work all your settings manually.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I originally bought this flash unit for my Samsung Galaxy ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this flash unit for my Samsung Galaxy NX, BUT IT DOES WORK FOR THE GALAXY NX. However I kept it as a manual flash for my Canon DSLR as it does fire off with my Canon cameras.
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This flash has been a game changer for me. Takes a little while to warm up, but well worth the investment if you're a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: Usually when you find essential but inexpensive equipment such as this, you see reviews saying things like” Its cheap. So you get what you pay for...” Well, this is NOT one of those reviews. This does just exactly what it says it does. It’s simple and easy to use. Definitely gets the job done and i would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Majestie

customer_reviews.title: Functions well on all my 35mm SLR cameras, Canon, Pentax & Minolta
customer_reviews.text: Similar features as my expensive flash guns that no longer function..And the cost is less that one third of the two electronic units that are 40 plus years old. Highly recommend to both pros and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Pops Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Great flash get one for yourself you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This flash is well worth the money. I put this on my camera and it worked great. I would buy another in a heartbeat. Battery life is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This flash is a battery hog, but it's a cheap and decent beginner flash.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great speed light
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and worked better than I hoped
customer_reviews.author: Wesley S Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesnt last that long
customer_reviews.text: A temporary fix to your lighting. Youll still have to spend money on another one down the road
customer_reviews.author: Alec Cobbs

customer_reviews.title: Worked well with my D3000
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this flash since it was not a name brand and the price. I was surprised, it works great. This flash is a steal. I am novice photographer and wanted something to start out with before I invested more money. I used this with Nikon D3000 and it synced well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee74

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! This picture was taken in a completely dark room. I love this, and also love that the battery is external! Doesn’t drain my camera battery. Only thing negative is that it sometimes slides of the mount, but I think it’s because of my camera. I use a Nikon D3200. Super easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Maree Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foe beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you are here you don't have money for a $500 dolar flash so just buy this one, learn how to used and make some money right now so im the future you get another fancy one.
customer_reviews.author: Cinepifisis

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly so impressed with this! For the price, you absolutely cannot beat it! I bought this expecting something that felt and looked cheap, just to learn on while I save for an investment Speedlite, but this is fantastic! It has helped so much already. I have only used in slave mode so far, but it is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get better for your $!
customer_reviews.text: Great inversement ! Can’t get better for your $! I’ve been using the same brand for professional shoot for more than 5 years and I’ve never been disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: JRH05

customer_reviews.title: Great product , great service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service , experienced a problem but they sent a new one
customer_reviews.author: Emre D

customer_reviews.title: Unit is unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem and the company was very professional and responsive ! I am very happy with the outcome. The speed light works great and is an outstanding value. I have recommended it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: B. Debley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an inexpensive flash to play with and happened upon this one. Knew what to expect from the description given and it works as advertised. Contrary to some of the "advice" in the Q and A it does work with my manual RT triggers. My only criticism would be the battery door which seems a bit iffy as most battery doors are. Would not hesitate to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Great for your camera pointing in different directions quickly.
customer_reviews.text: But I did not like the fact that it did NOT work on my Nikon Coolpix P1000.
customer_reviews.author: John House

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating because I will be starting a shoot and suddenly the flash acts like it’s not connected to the hot shoe
customer_reviews.text: Works when it wants to. Frustrating because I will be starting a shoot and suddenly the flash acts like it’s not connected to the hot shoe. When it does work, it gives off good light. Bounce card is nice. But I will be returning it. —Canon 6D Mark ii
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last, but great light!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My only issue is the batteries don't last more than one session. Kind of disappointing, but other than that the lighting it adds is great! I would recommend for a beginner, cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was supprized at the function and quality for the price. You definitly need an agle flash for most shooting, and the built in diffuser and reflector are a nice touch. Very happy with the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gulley

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because we don't have a lot light in the house to take pictures of our babiesnow the pictures look so much better, nice products, good value for you money.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it'll last a very long time
customer_reviews.text: The product came in fully intact, very easy to use, great quality for the price! Test it in a dark/very low lit room and see the difference! I also use this during the day to illuminate. Facial/neck shadows.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst, but definitely not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok product for the money, but there are better at this price point. The flash keeps flopping over and launching my fong, which costs more than the flash itself. Good as an emergency backup, but not for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, well-priced Flash
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, well-priced Flash, super bright flash setting, great for outdoor night shooting as well as the multiple angles you can aim the flash to. Will buy another one as a fill-flash and a remote flash commander as my Nikon D3300 does not come with that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Preatorian

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a beginner in photography and he loves it. It's easy to use and makes the pictures look great. I'm not sure if it's what a professional would want, but it's great for a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great flashes
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these so I can start getting into photography. Used them on a Canon and Nikon SLR. Easy to set up and use. Can't beat the price. Recieved them super quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: This will not work with my Nikon D50
customer_reviews.text: I asked before I ordered and they said it would work but it does not work with my Nikon D50. I have been on every site I could find looking for help but it simply will not work with the D50. I will be turning it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Milliner

customer_reviews.title: I want my refund!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work with my camera so I sent it back. I'm currently waiting on my refund. Someone from this company needs to contact me!
customer_reviews.author: TBaby228

customer_reviews.title: Nice, affordable flash
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Packaging was great. Very easy to install and use product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great flash, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera flash for my head shots , and table top photos. Gray lighting for my shots. This was an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only have done test shots to try it will update review once I use at photo shoot next week
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Purchased it twice
customer_reviews.text: Loved this speedlight so much I purchased it twice. Next stop I’m purchasing the HSS version. I didn’t think it would be powerful enough for outdoors - boy was I WRONG.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Got 3 of these flashes and although they are big ...
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 of these flashes and although they are big in size, they all work perfectly as a primary flash on the hot shoe or as a slave flash! At 29.00 each, I got more than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We already know this because of the price but the design is cheap as the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flash!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice if your looking for something simple! Amazing flash!
customer_reviews.author: Cole Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Battery hog.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and lights up the subject well. But be prepared to have lots of batteries on hand. High battery consumption if left on.
customer_reviews.author: William Struse

customer_reviews.title: for a begginer it's great
customer_reviews.text: A basic flash. for its price, it does what it's supposed to do. for a begginer it's great
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio Armijo

customer_reviews.title: It works without any problems.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great asset to my Canon. My pictures during indoor events are even more beautiful being able to direct the flash away from my subjects, but still have perfect lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Shelita

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with t3i Cannon DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with my t3i Cannon DSLR. Quality product for the price at speedy delivery service!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright so you need to be very careful when using it. Honestly, I haven't used it much since I bought it. It's just sitting in my camera bag. If you really don't need it, don't buy it. It does have adjustable buttons but they are all very bright.
customer_reviews.author: kormassa massah

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I use the flash in manual settings because my Samsung NX3000 can't talk to it, other settings worked just as fine. I highly recommend it as a starter flash for anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: 'Twas a gift.
customer_reviews.text: The recipient says that it works for what he has learned thus far. He is still learning about it but would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Bee

customer_reviews.title: It seems great, need to try a few more times
customer_reviews.text: I got another one to try... It seems great, need to try a few more times, to make sure we are good to go! First one must have been a malfunction. Glad I was able to receive another one. Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work and didn’t even come with an instruction manual. I wish I could give it 0 stars. Invest in a real external flash people
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these I have owned. Works well for manual off camera flash using my pocket wizards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is really great flash for affordable price.. but can someone help me how to connect it camera without attaching it?
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mehsikomer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried with the low price but I wanted to try it anyway. I have been so pleased with this for fill lighting or just generally lighting people indoors or out. Paired with a diffuser I am absolutely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: great quality for the price!! Played around with it for a few hours today and the picture quality with the speed light is a beauty! I use it with my canon rebel t5
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light for the value!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value and need! Very bright and adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This light is better than the light I paid three times the price for. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Szatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flash
customer_reviews.text: This flash is everything the description included. Well worth the purchase and recommend for other photographers.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a decent flash. Shame the NX300 doesn't have more of its own flash options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very good flash. Has worked perfectly and is well made
customer_reviews.text: Very good flash. Has worked perfectly and is well made. I didn't expect much at this price but am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners learning how to use a speedlight but ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginners learning how to use a speedlight but takes a long time to recharge which resulted in a lot of missed photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product it fit for use. Works well with my canon t5.
customer_reviews.author: Wils WIll

customer_reviews.title: Syncs with my Canon camera like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Flash works perfectly. Syncs with my Canon camera like a Charm. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: M. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great Flash ...Shipped fast!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera flash for my Nikon D300. Shipped fast and was packaged very well! Good buy too, as I was told by my professional photographer friend.
customer_reviews.author: tamalam

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Still learning all of it's capabilities but so far it is an excellent unit.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Canon T5i?
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my Canon T5i & the flash doesn’t even go off when I snap a photo. Is it not comparable with my camera?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far getting some great pics.
customer_reviews.text: Still learning to use it, so far getting some great pics.
customer_reviews.author: Stoli

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have this.
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks a bit small and reality it is bigger but this is a fantastic item, I like this, bought for my d7000 , fits and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Great flash!
customer_reviews.text: Bought yo use with my Nikon d3000 and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: mrozzell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got it and really appreciate, Didn’t tdy it yet hoping I won’t be disappointed

customer_reviews.text: First time I purchase a flash. Will take some use to playing with it. Over all, good price and reading on others that purchase it. Will be happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: This are my first off camera flash I've ever bought. I got it in and I loved it so much I turned around about another one. I all also be buy a 3rd one for a back light.

customer_reviews.text: The Speedlite works with both my Nikons. Its adjustable versatility makes it a valuable tool for photographers.

product_meta.title: Powerextra Professional DF-400 Speedlite Camera Flash for Canon Nikon Pentax Samsung Fujifilm Olympus Panasonic Sigma Minolta Leica Ricoh DSLR Cameras and Digital Cameras with Single-Contact Hotshoe
feature_bullets: Powerextra speedlite with a guide number of 33 (ISO 100/1m), Support manual mode, S1 and S2 wireless flash trigger modes, Single-contact hot shoe.

Approximate 3.0 seconds flash recycle time, Power saving automatic shutdown function, automatic save function. For a test flash, Press the test button to fire a test flash with the current mode settings.

The flash has 8 level of power output control which indicated by 8 pieces of LED lamp for different level. Powered by 4 pcs AA-size battery backup, provides PC port, you can make the flash synchronous by connecting to the PC port.
Head Rotation: Vertical Rotation Angle: 0~90 Degrees, Horizontal Rotation Angle: 0~270 Degrees.
Package included: Powerextra DF-400 speedlite ×1, Protective bag ×1, Mini Stand ×1, Instruction manual ×1
